benchmark_details.name: SOCBench-D (Service Discovery Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: SOCBench-D is a novel service discovery benchmark comprising natural language queries and expected endpoints to evaluate RAG for OpenAPI endpoint discovery comprehensively across numerous domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark service discovery with natural language queries across the most relevant domains and evaluate Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques.

data.source: Generated OpenAPIs using a Large Language Model (LLM).
data.annotation: Automated generation and validation using LLMs.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the accuracy of endpoint retrieval against expected results across various domains.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision indicates better filtering of relevant endpoint information; higher recall reflects the ability to retrieve more correct endpoints.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through the creation of multiple instances and checking endpoint correctness.
